title: Giving Tuesday NOW
content:
Donate today and your gift can be DOUBLED through our #GivingTuesdayNow matching challenge--up to $5,000!

Your gift will be put to use right away to help with meals and safety for people who are struggling with job loss or homelessness.

As the COVID-19 crisis continues, your support makes a tremendous difference in lives of our most vulnerable neighbors.

Thank you for caring and giving as generously as you're able!
